### Référence qui me parait pas mal pour les estimations

[Li et al. MedRxiv, 01/03](./biblio/li-preprint-01.03.pdf)

- **Mean generation time**: 3.3 days
- **Mean incubation time**: 7.2 days
- **Possibly infectious 3.9 days before major symptoms onset**
- **R0** 1.54, in context of contact tracing, quarantaine and isolation measures
